hero.title: کنترل در سطح کارگردان با
hero.subtitle: معماری تولید چندوجهی یکپارچه. ایجاد ویدئوهای سینمایی از متن، تصاویر و صدا با کنترل و واقع‌گرایی بی‌سابقه.

text_to_video.title: Text to Video AI
text_to_video.desc: Describe scenes, characters and camera moves in natural language and let our Text to Video AI turn them into coherent multi-shot videos.

image_to_video.title: Image to Video AI
image_to_video.desc: Upload a single reference photo and watch it become a short AI-generated video. Preserve identity and style with high fidelity.

text_to_image.title: Text to Image AI
text_to_image.desc: Turn text prompts into high-resolution images. Describe style, lighting and composition once, then generate multiple variations.

ai_tools.title: AI Video Effects & Tools
ai_tools.desc: Upload photos, choose an AI video effect template and let our system auto-generate a short stylized clip.
